channel.title: Comments on: First Contact: A Sort‑of‑Guest Post
channel.description: BDSM, books and missing links by Xiao Yingtai

item.title: By: Xiao Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/first-contact/#comment-643">Vivian Nyx</a>.
Thank you! I'm so glad someone feels the same way.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Vivian Nyx.

Thank you! I’m so glad someone feels the same way.

item.title: By: Vivian Nyx
item.dc:creator: Vivian Nyx
item.description: That was a wonderful and lovely message! I know all too well the inundations that serve to lower our collective faith in humanity. To the good guys, indeed. Hear hear!
item.content:encoded: That was a wonderful and lovely message! I know all too well the inundations that serve to lower our collective faith in humanity. To the good guys, indeed. Hear hear!
